thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mulesoft Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mulesoft Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Mulesoft Inc:
* MULESOFT ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.26 TO $0.30
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 TO $0.09
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $405 MILLION TO $415 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $87 MILLION TO $90 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 60 PERCENT TO $88.7 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12
* SETS TARGET OF $1 BILLION IN TOTAL REVENUE IN 2021 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08, REVENUE VIEW $87.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
